name: Samsung Galaxy S21
description: The Samsung Galaxy S21 features a 6.2-inch AMOLED display, a triple-lens camera system, and a Snapdragon 888 processor.

name: iPhone 13 Pro
description: The iPhone 13 Pro eatures a 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display, a triple-lens camera system with LiDAR scanner, and an A15 Bionic chip.

name: Google Pixel 6 pro
description: The Google Pixel 6 pro features a 6.4-inch OLED display, a dual-lens camera system, and a custom Google Tensor chip.

name: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 3
description: The Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 3 features a 7.6-inch foldable Dynamic AMOLED display, a triple-lens camera system, and a Snapdragon 888 processor.

name: OnePlus 10 Pro
description: The OnePlus 10 Pro features a 6.7-inch Fluid AMOLED display, a quad-lens camera system, and a Snapdragon 895 processor.

name: Xiaomi Mi 12s Ultra
description: The Xiaomi Mi 12s Ultra features a 6.81-inch AMOLED display, a quad-lens camera system, and a Snapdragon 895 processor.

name: MacBook Pro 16-inch
description: The MacBook Pro 16-inch features a 16-inch Retina display, an M1 Pro chip, and up to 64GB of RAM.

name: Dell XPS 13
description: The Dell XPS 13 features a 13.4-inch InfinityEdge display, an 11th Gen Intel Core processor, and up to 16GB of RAM.

name: Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Carbon
description: The Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Carbon features a 14-inch IPS display, an 11th Gen Intel Core processor, and up to 32GB of RAM.

name: Asus ROG Zephyrus G14
description: The Asus ROG Zephyrus G14 features a 14-inch Full HD display, an AMD Ryzen 9 processor, and an NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 graphics card.
